title: Complete DevOps Bootcamp - Zero to Hero
description: Master DevOps from fundamentals to advanced concepts. This comprehensive course covers Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, AWS, Terraform, and more. Includes 50+ hours of content with hands-on projects and real-world scenarios.

title: Kubernetes Mastery: From Beginner to Advanced
description: Deep dive into Kubernetes container orchestration. Learn cluster management, deployments, services, ingress, helm charts, and production best practices with real-world examples.

title: AWS Cloud Infrastructure & DevOps
description: Build and manage scalable cloud infrastructure on AWS. Covers EC2, VPC, S3, RDS, Lambda, CloudFormation, and DevOps best practices for AWS environments.

title: Terraform Infrastructure as Code Complete Course
description: Master Infrastructure as Code with Terraform. Learn to provision and manage cloud resources across AWS, Azure, and GCP. Includes modules, state management, and advanced patterns.

title: CI/CD Pipelines with Jenkins & GitLab
description: Build robust CI/CD pipelines for modern applications. Master Jenkins, GitLab CI, automated testing, deployment strategies, and DevOps automation workflows.

title: Docker & Microservices Architecture
description: Learn Docker containerization and microservices design patterns. Build, deploy, and scale containerized applications with Docker Compose and best practices.
